name: Future Futures - Command Z
description: Command Z is a virtual reality gallery poised as a space for collaboration founded to engage the exponential digitization of art and its presentation. Future Futures was developed during the Jump Into The Light artist residency in the Lower East Side of New York City.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 4 GB available space
